import React from 'react' import './Stats.css' const Stats = ({pokemon}) => { return (
{pokemon.map(poke => (

Stats about {poke.name}

{poke.stats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.stat.name} : {stat.base_stat}

))}
))}
Mark Otto @mdo
Jacob Thornton @fat
) } export default Stats
